trans-unit.source: :information_source: Source maps and assets referenced with url: when style loader is used with { options: { sourceMap: true } } option, the CSS modules will be generated as Blobs, so relative paths don't work (they would be relative to chrome:blob or chrome:devtools). In order for assets to maintain correct paths setting output.publicPath property of webpack configuration must be set, so that absolute paths are generated. Alternatively you can enable the convertToAbsoluteUrls option mentioned above.
trans-unit.target: ：information_source：使用 url 引用的源地图和资源：当样式加载器与 { options: { sourceMap: true } } 选项一起使用时，CSS模块将作为 Blob 生成，因此相对路径不起作用（它们是相对路径）到 chrome:blob 或 chrome:devtools ）。为了使资产保持正确的路径，必须设置webpack配置的 output.publicPath 属性，以便生成绝对路径。另外，您可以启用上面提到的 convertToAbsoluteUrls 选项。

trans-unit.source: WebWorkers are restricted by a same-origin policy, so if your webpack assets are not being served from the same origin as your application, their download may be blocked by your browser. This scenario can commonly occur if you are hosting your assets under a CDN domain. Even downloads from the webpack-dev-server could be blocked.

trans-unit.source: "." property
trans-unit.target: "." 财产

trans-unit.source: "default" condition
trans-unit.target: "default" 条件

trans-unit.source: "eager": Generates no extra chunk. All modules are included in the current chunk and no additional network requests are made. A Promise is still returned but is already resolved. In contrast to a static import, the module isn't executed until the call to import() is made.
trans-unit.target: "eager" ：不生成额外的块。所有模块都包含在当前块中，并且没有其他网络请求。一个 Promise 仍然是返回，但已经解决了。与静态导入相反，该模块在调用 import() 之前不会执行。

trans-unit.source: "empty": Provide an empty object.
trans-unit.target: "empty" ：提供一个空对象。

trans-unit.source: "eval" has the best performance, but doesn't assist you for transpiled code.
trans-unit.target: "eval" 具有最佳性能，但不能帮助您进行代码转换。

trans-unit.source: "lazy" (default): Generates a lazy-loadable chunk for each import()ed module.
trans-unit.target: "lazy" （默认）：为每个 import() ed模块生成一个可延迟加载的块。

trans-unit.source: "lazy-once": Generates a single lazy-loadable chunk that can satisfy all calls to import(). The chunk will be fetched on the first call to import(), and subsequent calls to import() will use the same network response. Note that this only makes sense in the case of a partially dynamic statement, e.g. import(`./locales/${language}.json`), where there are multiple module paths that could potentially be requested.
trans-unit.target: "lazy-once" ：生成一个可以满足所有对 import() 调用的可延迟加载的块。该块将在对 import() 的第一次调用时获取，随后对 import() 的调用将使用相同的网络响应。请注意，这仅在部分动态语句的情况下才有意义，例如 import(`./locales/${language}.json`) ，其中可能会请求多个模块路径。

trans-unit.source: "mock": Provide a mock that implements the expected interface but has little or no functionality.
trans-unit.target: "mock" ：提供一个实现预期接口但功能很少或没有的模拟。

trans-unit.source: "mock": The fixed value "/".
trans-unit.target: "mock" ：固定值 "/" 。

trans-unit.source: "mock": The fixed value "index.js".
trans-unit.target: "mock" ：固定值 "index.js" 。

trans-unit.source: "module": Use with ES6 ready code.
trans-unit.target: "module" ：与ES6就绪代码一起使用。

trans-unit.source: "text/javascript" (default)
trans-unit.target: "text/javascript" （默认）

trans-unit.source: "weak": Tries to load the module if the module function has already been loaded in some other way (i. e. another chunk imported it or a script containing the module was loaded). A Promise is still returned but, only successfully resolves if the chunks are already on the client. If the module is not available, the Promise is rejected. A network request will never be performed. This is useful for universal rendering when required chunks are always manually served in initial requests (embedded within the page), but not in cases where app navigation will trigger an import not initially served.
trans-unit.target: "weak" ：如果已经以其他方式加载了模块功能（例如，导入了另一个块或加载了包含该模块的脚本），则尝试加载该模块。一个 Promise 仍会返回，但是，只有成功地解决了，如果块是已经在客户端上。如果模块不可用，则 Promise 被拒绝。永远不会执行网络请求。当所需的块始终在初始请求中手动提供（嵌入在页面中）时，这对于通用渲染很有用，但在应用程序导航将触发最初不提供服务的导入的情况下，则不可用。

trans-unit.source: <dom-module> becomes a string which is registered at runtime
trans-unit.target: <dom-module> 成为在运行时注册的字符串

trans-unit.source: <link rel="import" href="./my-other-element.html"> -> import './my-other-element.html';
trans-unit.target: <link rel="import" href="./my-other-element.html"> -> import './my-other-element.html';

trans-unit.source: <link> paths matching these conditions (see [Condition] in the webpack documentation) will not be changed when transformed into imports. This can be useful for respecting aliases, loader syntax (e.g. markup-inline-loader!./my-element.html), or module paths.
trans-unit.target: <link> 转换为 import 时，符合这些条件的<link>路径（请参阅webpack文档中的[Condition]）不会更改。这对于遵守别名，加载程序语法（例如 markup-inline-loader!./my-element.html ）或模块路径很有用。

trans-unit.source: <link>s pointing to paths matching these conditions (see [Condition] in the webpack documentation) will not be transformed into imports.
trans-unit.target: <link> 指向符合这些条件的路径的<link>（请参阅webpack文档中的[Condition]）不会转换为 import 。

trans-unit.source: <script src="./other-script.js"></script> -> import './other-script.js';
trans-unit.target: <script src="./other-script.js"></script> -> import './other-script.js'; ./other-script.js ';

trans-unit.source: <script>/* contents */</script> -> /* contents */
trans-unit.target: <script>/* contents */</script> -> /* contents */

trans-unit.source: '...' can be used in optimization.minimizer to access the defaults.
trans-unit.target: '...' 可以在 optimization.minimizer 中使用“ ...”来访问默认值。

trans-unit.source: 'anonymous' - Enable cross-origin loading without credentials
trans-unit.target: 'anonymous' -启用不带凭据的跨域加载

trans-unit.source: 'auto' - emit warnings in development mode and emit errors in production mode (default behavior)
trans-unit.target: 'auto' auto'-在 development 模式下发出警告，在 production 模式下发出错误（默认行为）

trans-unit.source: 'built' - whether the asset has been built;
trans-unit.target: 'built' -资产是否已建造；

trans-unit.source: 'cacheable' - whether the item is cacheable;
trans-unit.target: 'cacheable' -项目是否可缓存；

trans-unit.source: 'chunks' - what chunks the item originates from (for example, if there are multiple subchunks for one chunk - the subchunks will be grouped together according to their main chunk);
trans-unit.target: 'chunks' -项目的起源（例如，如果一个块有多个子块-子块将根据其主要块分组在一起）；

trans-unit.source: 'eager': Generates no extra chunk. All modules are included in the current chunk and no additional network requests are made. A Promise is still returned but is already resolved. In contrast to a static import, the module isn't executed until the call to import() is made.
trans-unit.target: 'eager' ：不生成额外的块。所有模块都包含在当前块中，并且不发出任何其他网络请求。一个 Promise 仍然是返回，但已经解决了。与静态导入相反，该模块在调用 import() 之前不会执行。

trans-unit.source: 'error' - errors only
trans-unit.target: 'error' -仅错误

trans-unit.source: 'errors' - amount of errors in items;
trans-unit.target: 'errors' -项目中的错误数量；

trans-unit.source: 'failed' - whether the item has failed compilation;
trans-unit.target: 'failed' -项目是否编译失败；

trans-unit.source: 'id' is the item's id;
trans-unit.target: 'id' 是商品的ID；

trans-unit.source: 'identifier' - identifier of the item;
trans-unit.target: 'identifier' -物品的标识符；

trans-unit.source: 'import' - uses import() to load a native EcmaScript module (async module)
trans-unit.target: 'import' import'-使用 import() 加载本机EcmaScript模块（异步模块）

trans-unit.source: 'index' - item's processing index;
trans-unit.target: 'index' -项目的处理索引；

trans-unit.source: 'info' - errors, warnings, and info messages
trans-unit.target: 'info' -错误，警告和信息消息

trans-unit.source: 'issuer' - an identifier of the issuer;
trans-unit.target: 'issuer' -发行人的标识符；

trans-unit.source: 'issuerId' - an id of the issuer;
trans-unit.target: 'issuerId' -发行人的ID；

trans-unit.source: 'issuerName' - a name of the issuer;
trans-unit.target: 'issuerName' -发行人的名称；

trans-unit.source: 'issuerPath' - a full issuer object. There's no real need to sort by this field;
trans-unit.target: 'issuerPath' -完整的发行者对象。确实没有必要按此字段进行排序；

trans-unit.source: 'lazy' (default): Generates a lazy-loadable chunk for each import()ed module.
trans-unit.target: 'lazy' （默认）：为每个 import() ed模块生成一个可延迟加载的块。

trans-unit.source: 'lazy-once': Generates a single lazy-loadable chunk that can satisfy all calls to import(). The chunk will be fetched on the first call to import(), and subsequent calls to import() will use the same network response. Note that this only makes sense in the case of a partially dynamic statement, e.g. import(`./locales/${language}.json`), where multiple module paths that can potentially be requested.
trans-unit.target: 'lazy-once' ：生成一个可以满足所有对 import() 调用的可延迟加载的块。该块将在对 import() 的第一次调用时获取，随后对 import() 的调用将使用相同的网络响应。请注意，这仅在部分动态语句的情况下才有意义，例如 import(`./locales/${language}.json`) ，其中可能会请求多个模块路径。

trans-unit.source: 'log' - errors, warnings, info messages, log messages, groups, clears. Collapsed groups are displayed in a collapsed state.
trans-unit.target: 'log' -错误，警告，信息消息，日志消息，组，清除。折叠的组以折叠状态显示。

trans-unit.source: 'log', true - errors, warnings, info messages, log messages, groups, clears. Collapsed groups are displayed in a collapsed state.
trans-unit.target: 'log' ， true -错误，警告，信息消息，日志消息，组，清除。折叠的组以折叠状态显示。

trans-unit.source: 'mock': The fixed value '/'.
trans-unit.target: 'mock' ：固定值 '/' 。

trans-unit.source: 'mock': The fixed value '/index.js'.
trans-unit.target: 'mock' ：固定值 '/index.js' 。

trans-unit.source: 'name' - a item's name that was assigned to it upon importing;
trans-unit.target: 'name' -导入时分配给它的项目名称；

trans-unit.source: 'none' - disable logging
trans-unit.target: 'none' -禁用日志记录

trans-unit.source: 'none', false - disable logging
trans-unit.target: 'none' ， false -禁用日志记录

trans-unit.source: 'optional' - whether the asset is optional;
trans-unit.target: 'optional' -资产是否可选；

trans-unit.source: 'pack': Store data when compiler is idle in a single file for all cached items
trans-unit.target: 'pack' ：当编译器空闲时将所有缓存项的数据存储在单个文件中

trans-unit.source: 'prefetched' - whether the asset will be prefetched;
trans-unit.target: 'prefetched' -资产是否将被预取；

trans-unit.source: 'promise' - same as 'var' but awaits the result (async module)
trans-unit.target: 'promise' -与 'var' 相同，但是等待结果（异步模块）

trans-unit.source: 'script' - load script exposing predefined global variables with HTML <script> element

trans-unit.source: 'weak': Tries to load the module if the module function has already been loaded in some other way (e.g. another chunk imported it or a script containing the module was loaded). A Promise is still returned, but only successfully resolves if the chunks are already on the client. If the module is not available, the Promise is rejected. A network request will never be performed. This is useful for universal rendering when required chunks are always manually served in initial requests (embedded within the page), but not in cases where app navigation will trigger an import not initially served.
trans-unit.target: 'weak' ：如果已经以其他方式加载了模块功能（例如，导入了另一个块或加载了包含该模块的脚本），则尝试加载该模块。一个 Promise 仍会返回，但只有成功地解决了，如果块是已经在客户端上。如果模块不可用，则 Promise 将被拒绝。网络请求将永远不会执行。当所需的块总是在初始请求中手动提供（嵌入在页面中）时，这对于通用渲染很有用，但在应用程序导航将触发最初不提供服务的导入的情况下，则不可用。

trans-unit.source: (lines only) - Source Maps are simplified to a single mapping per line. This usually means a single mapping per statement (assuming you author is this way). Combining with minimizing is not possible as minimizers usually only emit a single line.
trans-unit.target: (lines only) -将源映射简化为每行一个映射。这通常意味着每个语句只有一个映射（假设您是通过这种方式编写的）。这样可以防止您在语句级别调试执行以及在行的列上设置断点。不可能与最小化结合，因为最小化器通常只发出一条线。

trans-unit.source: Rule.type sets the type for a matching module. This prevents defaultRules and their default importing behaviors from occurring. For example, if you want to load a .json file through a custom loader, you'd need to set the type to javascript/auto to bypass webpack's built-in json importing. (See v4.0 changelog for more details)
trans-unit.target: Rule.type 设置匹配模块的类型。这样可以防止defaultRules及其默认导入行为发生。例如，如果您想通过自定义加载器加载 .json 文件，则需要将 type 设置为 javascript/auto 以绕过webpack的内置json导入。（有关更多详细信息，请参见v4.0 changelog）

trans-unit.source: cacheCompression: Default true. When set, each Babel transform output will be compressed with Gzip. If you want to opt-out of cache compression, set it to false -- your project may benefit from this if it transpiles thousands of files.
trans-unit.target: cacheCompression ：默认为 true 。设置后，每个Babel变换输出将使用Gzip压缩。如果要选择不使用缓存压缩，请将其设置为 false －如果它可以编译成千上万个文件，则您的项目可能会从中受益。

trans-unit.source: cacheDirectory: Default false. When set, the given directory will be used to cache the results of the loader. Future webpack builds will attempt to read from the cache to avoid needing to run the potentially expensive Babel recompilation process on each run. If the value is blank (loader: 'babel-loader?cacheDirectory') or true (loader: babel-loader?cacheDirectory=true) the loader will use the default cache directory in node_modules/.cache/babel-loader or fallback to the default OS temporary file directory if no node_modules folder could be found in any root directory.
trans-unit.target: cacheDirectory ：默认为 false 。设置后，给定目录将用于缓存加载程序的结果。未来的webpack构建将尝试从缓存中读取数据，以避免在每次运行时都可能运行可能代价昂贵的Babel重新编译过程。如果值为空（ loader: 'babel-loader?cacheDirectory' ）或 true （ loader: babel-loader?cacheDirectory=true ），则加载程序将使用 node_modules/.cache/babel-loader 中的默认缓存目录，或回退到如果在任何根目录中都找不到 node_modules 文件夹，则为默认的OS临时文件目录。

trans-unit.source: cacheDirectory: Default false. When set, the given directory will be used to cache the results of the loader. Future webpack builds will attempt to read from the cache to avoid needing to run the potentially expensive Babel recompilation process on each run. If the value is set to true in options ({cacheDirectory: true}), the loader will use the default cache directory in node_modules/.cache/babel-loader or fallback to the default OS temporary file directory if no node_modules folder could be found in any root directory.
trans-unit.target: cacheDirectory ：默认为 false 。设置后，给定目录将用于缓存加载程序的结果。未来的webpack构建将尝试从缓存中读取数据，以避免在每次运行时都运行潜在昂贵的Babel重新编译过程。如果在选项（ {cacheDirectory: true} ）中将该值设置为 true ，则加载程序将使用 node_modules/.cache/babel-loader 中的默认缓存目录，如果找不到 node_modules 文件夹，则将使用默认的OS临时文件目录在任何根目录中。

trans-unit.target: cacheGroup - cacheGroup 模块

trans-unit.source: cacheIdentifier: Default is a string composed by the @babel/core's version, the babel-loader's version, the contents of .babelrc file if it exists, and the value of the environment variable BABEL_ENV with a fallback to the NODE_ENV environment variable. This can be set to a custom value to force cache busting if the identifier changes.

trans-unit.source: cheap-eval-source-map - Similar to eval-source-map, each module is executed with eval(). It is "cheap" because it doesn't have column mappings, it only maps line numbers. It ignores SourceMaps from Loaders and only display transpiled code similar to the eval devtool.

trans-unit.source: cheap-module-eval-source-map - Similar to cheap-eval-source-map, however, in this case Source Maps from Loaders are processed for better results. However Loader Source Maps are simplified to a single mapping per line.

trans-unit.source: deterministic option is useful for long term caching, but still results in smaller bundles compared to hashed. Length of the numeric value is chosen to fill a maximum of 80% of the id space. By default a minimum length of 3 digits is used when optimization.moduleIds is set to deterministic. To override the default behaviour set optimization.moduleIds to false and use the webpack.ids.DeterministicModuleIdsPlugin.

trans-unit.source: eval-cheap-module-source-map - Similar to eval-cheap-source-map, however, in this case Source Maps from Loaders are processed for better results. However Loader Source Maps are simplified to a single mapping per line.
trans-unit.target: eval-cheap-module-source-map map-与 eval-cheap-source-map 相似，但是，在这种情况下，对Loader的Source Maps进行处理以获得更好的结果。但是，Loader Source Maps简化为每行一个映射。

trans-unit.source: eval-cheap-source-map - Similar to eval-source-map, each module is executed with eval(). It is "cheap" because it doesn't have column mappings, it only maps line numbers. It ignores SourceMaps from Loaders and only display transpiled code similar to the eval devtool.
trans-unit.target: eval-cheap-source-map map-与 eval-source-map 相似，每个模块都使用 eval() 执行。这是“便宜的”，因为它没有列映射，只映射行号。它会忽略来自Loaders的SourceMap，而仅显示类似于 eval devtool的转码代码。

trans-unit.source: eval-source-map - Each module is executed with eval() and a SourceMap is added as a DataUrl to the eval(). Initially it is slow, but it provides fast rebuild speed and yields real files. Line numbers are correctly mapped since it gets mapped to the original code. It yields the best quality SourceMaps for development.
trans-unit.target: eval-source-map map- 每个模块都使用 eval() 执行，并且SourceMap作为DataUrl添加到 eval() 。最初它很慢，但是重建速度很快，并且可以生成真实文件。行号已正确映射，因为它已映射到原始代码。它为开发提供了最优质的SourceMap。

trans-unit.source: eval - Each module is executed with eval() and //@ sourceURL. This is pretty fast. The main disadvantage is that it doesn't display line numbers correctly since it gets mapped to transpiled code instead of the original code (No Source Maps from Loaders).
trans-unit.target: eval -每个模块都使用 eval() 和 //@ sourceURL 执行。这非常快。主要缺点是，由于行号被映射到已转换的代码而不是原始代码（没有来自加载程序的源映射），因此无法正确显示行号。

trans-unit.source: eval wraps modules in eval("string") and the minimizer does not handle strings.
trans-unit.target: eval 将模块包装在 eval("string") ，并且最小化器不处理字符串。

trans-unit.source: require.resolveWeak is the foundation of universal rendering (SSR + Code Splitting), as used in packages such as react-universal-component. It allows code to render synchronously on both the server and initial page-loads on the client. It requires that chunks are manually served or somehow available. It's able to require modules without indicating they should be bundled into a chunk. It's used in conjunction with import() which takes over when user navigation triggers additional imports.
trans-unit.target: require.resolveWeak 是通用渲染（SSR +代码拆分）的基础，用于react-universal-component之类的软件包中。它允许代码在服务器上同步呈现，并在客户端上初始页面加载。它需要手动提供或以某种方式可用的块。它能够要求模块而无需指示它们应该捆绑在一起。它与 import() 结合使用，后者在用户导航触发其他导入时接管。

trans-unit.source: splitChunks.minRemainingSize option was introduced in webpack 5 to avoid zero sized modules by ensuring that the minimum size of the chunk which remains after splitting is above a limit. Defaults to 0 in 'development' mode. For other cases splitChunks.minRemainingSize defaults to the value of splitChunks.minSize so it doesn't need to be specified manually except for the rare cases where deep control is required.
trans-unit.target: splitChunks.minRemainingSize 5中引入了splitChunks.minRemainingSize选项，通过确保拆分后剩余的最小块大小大于限制来避免大小为零的模块。在“开发”模式下默认为 0 。在其他情况下， splitChunks.minRemainingSize 的默认值为 splitChunks.minSize 的值，因此除极少数需要深度控制的情况外，无需手动指定它。

trans-unit.source: test (string|RegExp|array): Include source maps for modules based on their extension (defaults to .js and .css).
trans-unit.target: test （ string|RegExp|array ）：包括基于模块扩展名的源映射（默认为 .js 和 .css ）。

trans-unit.source: test (string|regex|array): Include source maps for modules based on their extension (defaults to .js and .css).
trans-unit.target: test （ string|regex|array ）：包括基于模块扩展名的源映射（默认为 .js 和 .css ）。

trans-unit.source: test5.20.0+: Specify which imported modules should be lazily compiled.
trans-unit.target: test 5.20.0+：指定应延迟编译哪些导入的模块。

trans-unit.source: test: All assets matching this RegExp are processed. Defaults to every asset.
trans-unit.target: test ：处理与该RegExp匹配的所有资产。默认为每个资产。

trans-unit.source: test: Test to match files against. Default: /\.js($|\?)/i
trans-unit.target: test ：测试以匹配文件。默认值：/ /\.js($|\?)/i

trans-unit.source: this.loadModule in a loader context uses CommonJS resolve rules by default. Use this.getResolve with an appropriate dependencyType, e.g. 'esm', 'commonjs' or a custom one before using a different semantic.
trans-unit.target: this.loadModule 加载程序上下文中的this.loadModule默认情况下使用CommonJS解析规则。使用 this.getResolve 用适当的 dependencyType ，如 'esm' ， 'commonjs' ，或者使用不同的语义前一个自定义的。

trans-unit.source: thisCallback - function to be invoked when the module finishes rebuilding.
trans-unit.target: thisCallback -模块重建完成时要调用的函数。

trans-unit.source: threshold: Only assets bigger than this size are processed. In bytes. Defaults to 0.
trans-unit.target: threshold ：仅处理大于此大小的资产。以字节为单位。默认为 0 。

trans-unit.source: timestamp: Compare timestamps to determine invalidation.
trans-unit.target: timestamp ：比较时间戳以确定无效。

trans-unit.source: topLevelAwait: Support the Top Level Await Stage 3 proposal, it makes the module an async module when await is used on the top-level
trans-unit.target: topLevelAwait ：支持“顶层等待”阶段3提议，当在顶层使用 await 时，它将使模块成为异步模块

trans-unit.source: traceur-loader Loads ES2015+ code and transpiles to ES5 using Traceur
trans-unit.target: traceur-loader 使用Traceur将ES2015 +代码加载并转换为ES5

trans-unit.source: transformed code - You see each module separated from each other, annotated with module names. You see the code before webpack transforms it, but after Loaders transpile it. Example: Instead of import {test} from "module"; class A extends test {} you see something like import {test} from "module"; var A = function(_test) { ... }(test);
trans-unit.target: transformed code -您看到每个模块彼此分开，并用模块名称注释。在webpack转换代码之前，但在Loaders转换代码之后，您会看到代码。示例：而不是 import {test} from "module"; class A extends test {} 中导入{test}；A类扩展了测试{}，您会看到类似于 import {test} from "module"; var A = function(_test) { ... }(test);

trans-unit.source: transportMode is an experimental option, meaning its usage could potentially change without warning.
trans-unit.target: transportMode 是一个实验性选项，这意味着其用法可能会更改，而不会发出警告。
